column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=When I went grocery shopping I started by looking in my refrigerator and figuring out what I needed to get .
#text=I made a shopping list based on this .
#text=Then I decided which store was the best to go to to buy these items .
#text=I decided that Publix was the best and closest store for me .
#text=I walked to the store with my empty backpack , and when I got in the first thing I did was check the clearance section and sales .
#text=After that I walked the aisle , making sure to pick up everything that I needed .
#text=I avoided using a shopping cart to be sure that I would not buy more than I could carry .
#text=After picking up all the items I went to the checkout where I paid for my purchases in cash .
#text=After that I put the items in my backpack and walked out of the store and back to my house .
